headline: Exelon (EXC) Beats Q2 Earnings Estimates
summary: Exelon (EXC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.41% and -1.91%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Exelon: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHICAGO (AP) — Exelon Corp. EXC) on Thursday reported second-quarter net income of $391 million. On a per-share basis, the Chicago-based company said it had net income of 39 cents.
